scripts.start: concurrently -p command 'npm run serve' 'npm run watch-js' 'npm run watch-styles'
scripts.watch-styles: npm run build-styles-dev && chokidar '**/*.less' './styles/**/*.css' -c 'npm run build-styles-dev'
scripts.build: npm run build-js && npm run build-styles
scripts.build-js: NODE_ENV=production browserify ./scripts/index.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -o ./bundle.js && npm run minify-js
scripts.build-styles: npm run build-styles-dev && npm run postcss && npm run minify-css
scripts.build-styles-dev: npm run build-less && npm run postcss && echo 'Styles built!'
scripts.lint: npm run jscs && npm run eslint
